import * as React from 'react';
import { fake, storiesOf, action, describe, it, specs, mount, shallow, expect } from 'storyUtils';

import { Candy } from './_base';

const stories = storiesOf('Candy', {});

stories.add('default', () => {
    const story = <Candy index={ 1 } isEaten={ false } handleClick={ action('foo') } />;

    specs(() => describe('default', () => {
        const component = mount(story);

        it('should exist', () => {
            expect(component.exists()).toBe(true);
        });
        it('should be uneaten', () => {
            expect(component.prop('isEaten')).toBe(false);
        });
    }));

    return story;
});
